item.title: Far beyond Harvard, conservative efforts to reshape higher education are gaining steam
item.description: Far beyond Harvard University and its standoff with the Trump administration, Republican officials in several states have been pushing for changes at public universities.

item.title: Families of the Idaho students Bryan Kohberger stabbed to death are set to see him sentenced
